The maides tragedy As it hath beene diuers times acted at the Blacke-friers by the Kings Maiesties Seruants. Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616. Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. aut
[84] p.
Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Richard Higgenbotham and are to be sold at the Angell in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1619.
By Francis Beaumont and John Fletcher. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A² B-L⁴. The first leaf is blank. A variant of the edition with Francis Constable in the imprint. Running title reads: The maydes tragedy. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
